item.title: Linux 6.19 GPU Driver Features: Color Pipeline API, Intel Xe3P, AMDGPU For GCN 1.0/1.1
item.description: The big set of kernel graphics driver features were merged today for the Linux 6.19 kernel. Plus the growing number of accelerator "accel" drivers for NPUs / AI accelerators...
